elves.title: Elves
elves.desc: The Elves, who called themselves the Quendi, and who in lore are commonly referred to as the Eldar (adj. Eldarin), were the first and eldest of the Children of Ilúvatar, and are considered to be the fairest and wisest of any race of Arda given sapience.

hobbits.title: Hobbits
hobbits.desc: Hobbits, also known as Halflings, were an ancient mortal race that lived in Middle-earth. Although their exact origins are unknown, they were initially found in the northern regions of Middle-earth and below the Vales of Anduin. At the beginning of the Third Age, hobbits moved north and west. Most of their race eventually founded the land of the Shire in about the year TA 1601, though one type of hobbit known as Stoors remained in the Anduin Vale (the type of hobbit Sméagol was).
